script: Ready or not, here I come.

Do you know who that is?

something your mom and I have to do.

What I'm trying to say is, uh...

No, it is not all right.
I wish I could change it, but I can't.
That's the name of the guy in the picture.

You're a pretty great dad, all right?
Right. You'll find yourself to the left.
You are here for the internship?
Okay. You'll find your badge to the left.
Are you having trouble finding yourself?
Born from the mind of our founder, Norman Osborn, the Oscorp Tower houses 108 floors of innovation.
Our scientific minds are pushing the boundaries of defense, biomedical and chemical technologies.
I'm a senior at Midtown Science, and I'm also head intern.
I'll be with you for the duration of your visit.
Remember that, all will be fine.
And if you forget that-- BOY: Listen.
Tell them Rodrigo Guevara is here.
Please, just tell them Rodrigo Guevara is here!
I guess I don't need to tell you what happens if you forget that.
Welcome. My name is Dr. Curtis Connors.
In case you're wondering, I'm a southpaw.
I'm not a cripple, I'm a scientist, and I'm the world's foremost authority on herpetology.
That's reptiles, for those of you who don't know.
But like the Parkinson's patient who watches on in horror as her body slowly betrays her, or the man with macular degeneration whose eyes grow dimmer each day, I long to fix myself.
I want to create a world without weakness.
Anyone care to venture a guess just how?
But the solution I'm thinking of is more radical.
PETER: Person gets Parkinson's when the brain cells that produce dopamine start to disappear.
But a zebra fish has the ability to regenerate cells on command.
If you could somehow give this ability to the woman you're talking about, that's that. She's...

He's one of Midtown Science's best and brightest.
I'll leave you in the more-than-capable hands of Miss Stacy.
If you'd like to gather round.

I have to lead this tour group.
So I'll ask you more about this later.
Do not get me in trouble.
I'm gonna take you to the bioreactor room now.

the vigilante and the car thief.

you don't believe what the police are saying, do you?

that made all of this possible.

could enhance humanity on an evolutionary scale.
